Wolaitta_Sentences: Dabaabai zananaa laatamu wara, gomppaa laatamu wara gido; pudiyaa ichchashu wara xoqqiya liiquwan dadettida liinuwaappe oosettida magalashoti de7ona; yaatidi nahaasiyaappe oosettida gedeti gidona.

English_Sentences: All the vessels of the tabernacle in all the service thereof, and all the pins thereof, and all the pins of the court, shall be of brass.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyan oottiyo oosuwaassi go7ettiyo miishsha ubbai, eta go77ai aiba gidikkokka, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa xishetu ubbaaranne dabaabaa xishetu ubbaarakka gujjin, nahaasiyaa birataappe oosettona.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt command the children of Israel, that they bring thee pure oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamp to burn always.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Xomppee to7ennan eexxiiddi de7ana mala, assi koshshiya zaitiyaa wogaraa teeraa caddidi gum77in kiyidaagaa neeyyo ehaana mala, Israa7eelata azaza.

English_Sentences: In the tabernacle of the congregation without the vail, which is before the testimony, Aaron and his sons shall order it from evening to morning before the LORD: it shall be a statute for ever unto their generations on the behalf of the children of Israel.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooninne a naati, xomppee GODAA sinttan qammida sa7ai wonttana gakkanaashin poo7ana mala, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa giddon, Markkaa Taabootaa sinttan de7iya magalashuwaappe kareera eettona. Hagee Israa7eela asaayyo merinau wotto woga gididi de7o.

English_Sentences: And take thou unto thee Aaron thy brother, and his sons with him, from among the children of Israel, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office, even Aaron, Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar, Aaron's sons.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Ne ishaa Aaroonanne a naata Nadaaba, Abiiha, El77aazaranne Itaamaara neekko ehiissa; eti qeese gididi taayyo oottana mala, Israa7eela asaa giddoppe eta dummaya.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make holy garments for Aaron thy brother for glory and for beauty.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ayyo bonchchuwaanne puulaa immana mala, ne ishaa Aaroonayyo qeesetettaa maayota giigissa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt speak unto all that are wise hearted, whom I have filled with the spirit of wisdom, that they may make Aaron's garments to consecrate him, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani aadhdhida eratettaa immido kushiyaa hiillaa eriya asa ubbaa xeesada, Aaroonayyo maayota giigissana mala yoota; i qeese gididi, taayyo oottanau dummatana.

English_Sentences: And these are the garments which they shall make; a breastplate, and an ephod, and a robe, and a broidered coat, a mitre, and a girdle: and they shall make holy garments for Aaron thy brother, and his sons, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti giigissana maayotikka hageeta: tiran wottiyoogaa, eefuudiyaa, adussa maayuwaa, alleeqettidi dadettida qoliyaa, shaashiyaanne danccuwaa. Ne ishai Aarooninne a naati qeese gididi taayyo oottiiddi geeshsha maayota maayana mala, sikkiyaageeti giigissoosona.

English_Sentences: And they shall take gold, and blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine linen.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kushiyaa hiillaa eriyaageetikka ha maayota giigissanau, worqqa qacinaa, salo milatiya, ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zo7o qacinaanne liiqo liinuwaa go7ettona.

English_Sentences: And they shall make the ephod of gold, of blue, and of purple, of scarlet, and fine twined linen, with cunning work.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Eefuudiyaa giyo maayuwaa worqqa qacinaappe, salo milatiya qacinaappe, ochchaa teeraa milatiya qacinaappe, shololla zo7o qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaa qacinaappe kushe hiillanchchati alleeqissidi giigissona.

English_Sentences: It shall have the two shoulderpieces thereof joined at the two edges thereof; and so it shall be joined together.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naa77u baggai gaittidi issuwaa gidana mala, naa77u hashiyaa bolli gattidi oittiya carqqee de7o.

English_Sentences: And the curious girdle of the ephod, which is upon it, shall be of the same, according to the work thereof; even of gold, of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hiillai alleeqissidi daddido danccoikka eefuudiyaa mala gididi, worqqaappe, salo milatiya, ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zo7o qacinaappenne liiqissi baqqido liinuwaappe oosetto.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take two onyx stones, and grave on them the names of the children of Israel:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Maragidiyaa giyo naa77u shuchchata ekkada, Yaaqooba naatu sunttaa eta bolli woocada xaafa.

English_Sentences: Six of their names on one stone, and the other six names of the rest on the other stone, according to their birth.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eta yeletaa maaraadan issi shuchchaa bolli usuppun sunttaa, hinkko shuchchaa bolli qassi attida usuppunatu sunttaa woocada xaafa.

English_Sentences: With the work of an engraver in stone, like the engravings of a signet, shalt thou engrave the two stones with the names of the children of Israel: thou shalt make them to be set in ouches of gold.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Maatafaa bolli sunttaa woocidi xaafiyoogaadan, he naa77u shuchchatu bolli Yaaqooba naatu sunttaa woocada xaafa; xaafada he shuchchata worqqaappe medhdhido shuchchaa oiqqiyaagaa bolli wotta.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put the two stones upon the shoulders of the ephod for stones of memorial unto the children of Israel: and Aaron shall bear their names before the LORD upon his two shoulders for a memorial.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatada tammanne naa77u Israa7eela zareta hassayiyoobaa gidana mala, ha naa77u shuchchata eefuudiyaara oittido hashiyaa carqqiyan wotta; yaatobare GODAA sinttan ubbatoo hassayettana mala, ha sunttata Aarooni ba hashiyan tookko.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make ouches of gold;
Wolaitta_Sentences: He shuchchata oiqqiyaagaa worqqaappe medhdha.

English_Sentences: And two chains of pure gold at the ends; of wreathen work shalt thou make them, and fasten the wreathen chains to the ouches.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi walahi bainna worqqaappe wodoruwaadan dooqqido qooriyan wottiyo naa77u sanssalatata giigissada, he naa77u shuchchaa oiqqiyaageetuura gatta oitta.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make the breastplate of judgment with cunning work; after the work of the ephod thou shalt make it; of gold, of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, and of fine twined linen, shalt thou make it.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "GODAA shenee aibakko oichchidi eriyo tiran wottiyoogaa kushe hiillanchchan ootissa. He tiran wottiyoogaa eefuudiyaa daddidoogaadan, worqqaappe, salo milatiya, ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zo7o qacinaappenne liiqo liinuwaappe dadda.

English_Sentences: Foursquare it shall be being doubled; a span shall be the length thereof, and a span shall be the breadth thereof.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ayyo oiddu zoozee de7ees; geesainne gomppai issi issi takkaaro gididi dakkoto.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt set in it settings of stones, even four rows of stones: the first row shall be a sardius, a topaz, and a carbuncle: this shall be the first row.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan a bolli oiddu maaran al77o shuchchata wotta; koiro maaran wottido shuchchai, sarddiyoona, tophaaziyooniyaanne phooliya inqquwaa.

English_Sentences: And the second row shall be an emerald, a sapphire, and a diamond.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naa77antto maaran baluura, sampperiyaanne almmaaziyaa giyo al77o shuchchata;

English_Sentences: And the third row a ligure, an agate, and an amethyst.
Wolaitta_Sentences: heezzantto maaran yaakinttiyaa, kelqqedooniyaanne ametesxxinoosiyaa;

English_Sentences: And the fourth row a beryl, and an onyx, and a jasper: they shall be set in gold in their inclosings.
Wolaitta_Sentences: oiddantto maaran biralle, maragidiyaa, yasphphiidiyaa. Hageeti ubbai worqqaappe oosettida shuchchaa oiqqiyaagaa bolli uttona.

English_Sentences: And the stones shall be with the names of the children of Israel, twelve, according to their names, like the engravings of a signet; every one with his name shall they be according to the twelve tribes.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Israa7eela naatu sunttaa qoodaadan, shuchchatu qoodaikka tammanne naa77a gidona; issoi issoi maatafadan woocettidi, tammanne naa77u zaretu sunttai he shuchchatun xaafetto.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make upon the breastplate chains at the ends of wreathen work of pure gold.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Tiran wottiyoogaayyo wodorodan dooqettida sanssalataa walahi bainna worqqaappe medhdha.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make upon the breastplate two rings of gold, and shalt put the two rings on the two ends of the breastplate.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naa77u worqqa migidota medhdhada, tiran wottiyoogaayyo qommo gaxa zoozetuura gattada oitta wotta.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put the two wreathen chains of gold in the two rings which are on the ends of the breastplate.
Wolaitta_Sentences: He naa77u worqqa sanssalatata tiran wottiyoogaayyo zoozetun de7iya migidotuura gattada oitta.

English_Sentences: And the other two ends of the two wreathen chains thou shalt fasten in the two ouches, and put them on the shoulderpieces of the ephod before it.
Wolaitta_Sentences: He sanssalatatuyyo hankko bagga xeeraa qassi eefuudiyaayyo sintta baggaara, hashiyaa carqqiyan de7iya shuchchaa oiqqiyaageetuura gatta qachcha.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make two rings of gold, and thou shalt put them upon the two ends of the breastplate in the border thereof, which is in the side of the ephod inward.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassikka naa77u worqqa migidota medhdhada, eefuudiyaappe kaallidi de7iya tiran wottiyoogaayyo soo baggaara de7iya naa77u zoozetu xeeran aatta.

English_Sentences: And two other rings of gold thou shalt make, and shalt put them on the two sides of the ephod underneath, toward the forepart thereof, over against the other coupling thereof, above the curious girdle of the ephod.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka, worqqaappe hara naa77u migidota medhdhada; eefuudiyaayyo sintta baggaara, hashiyaa carqqiyaappe garssa baggaara, eefuudiyaa xeessan qachchiyoogaappe qommoora, sihoi gaittosaa matan eta oitta.

English_Sentences: And they shall bind the breastplate by the rings thereof unto the rings of the ephod with a lace of blue, that it may be above the curious girdle of the ephod, and that the breastplate be not loosed from the ephod.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Tiran wottiyoogan de7iya migidota eefuudiyan de7iya migidotuura gattidi, salo milatiya baqettan qachcha; yaatikko, tiran wottiyoogee xeessaappe qommoora de7iyo gishshau, qashoi dol77enna.

English_Sentences: And Aaron shall bear the names of the children of Israel in the breastplate of judgment upon his heart, when he goeth in unto the holy place, for a memorial before the LORD continually.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Aarooni Geeshsha Sohuwaa geliyo wode, ha tiran wottiyoogan de7iya Israa7eela zaretu sunttata tookko. Yaatobare taani GODAI ubbatoo ta asaa hassayana.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put in the breastplate of judgment the Urim and the Thummim; and they shall be upon Aaron's heart, when he goeth in before the LORD: and Aaron shall bear the judgment of the children of Israel upon his heart before the LORD continually.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi Uriimiyaanne Tumiima giyoobata tiran wottiyoogan yegga. Aarooni GODAA sintti aadhdhiiddi, ba tiran wotti ekkidi gelo. Ta shenee aibakko Israa7eela asaa erissana mala, i ta sinttan oottanau geliyo wode ubban tiraa kiisiyaappe xaissenna.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make the robe of the ephod all of blue.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Eefuudiyaappe bollaara maayiyo adussa maayuwaa muleera salo milatiya carqqiyaappe giigissa.

English_Sentences: And there shall be an hole in the top of it, in the midst thereof: it shall have a binding of woven work round about the hole of it, as it were the hole of an habergeon, that it be not rent.
Wolaitta_Sentences: He adussa maayuwaayyo qooriyaa aattiyoosaa medhdha. He sohoi peerettennaadan, soo qalam77ada, yuushsha aattada sikka.

English_Sentences: And beneath upon the hem of it thou shalt make pomegranates of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, round about the hem thereof; and bells of gold between them round about:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Adussa maayuwaa duge bagga macaraa yuushuwan salo milatiya, ochchaa teeraa milatiyaanne shololla zo7o qacinaappe, roomaaniyaa teeraa misileta medhdha. Yaatada eta gidduwan worqqaappe oosettida daalata walahan ootta.

English_Sentences: A golden bell and a pomegranate, a golden bell and a pomegranate, upon the hem of the robe round about.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Worqqaa daalatinne roomaaniyaa teera misileti he adussa maayuwaa duge bagga xeeraayyo yuushuwan walahan aadhdhona.

English_Sentences: And it shall be upon Aaron to minister: and his sound shall be heard when he goeth in unto the holy place before the LORD, and when he cometh out, that he die not.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni qeesetettan oottiyo wode, ha adussa maayuwaa maayo; GODAA sintti Geeshsha Sohuwaa geliyo wodenne kiyiyo wode, daalai waassana. I hegaa maayikko haiqqenna.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make a plate of pure gold, and grave upon it, like the engravings of a signet, HOLINESS TO THE LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Walahi bainna worqqaappe issi alleequwaa medhdhada maatafaa bolli woociyoogaadan, a bolli woocada, GODAASSI GEESHSHA GIDIDI DUMMATIIS yaagada xaafa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put it on a blue lace, that it may be upon the mitre; upon the forefront of the mitre it shall be.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Xaafada huuphiyan xaaxiyo shaashiyaa bolli qachchana mala, salo milatiya baqettaa an aatta.

English_Sentences: And it shall be upon Aaron's forehead, that Aaron may bear the iniquity of the holy things, which the children of Israel shall hallow in all their holy gifts; and it shall be always upon his forehead, that they may be accepted before the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aattobare Aarooni a ba som77uwan wotto; hegan Israa7eela asai GODAASSI imotaa immiiddi mooridobi de7ikkokka, he mooruwaa Aarooni tookkees. Asai ehiyoobaa GODAI ekkana mala, i he xifatiyaa ubbatonkka ba som77uwan wottanau koshshees.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt embroider the coat of fine linen, and thou shalt make the mitre of fine linen, and thou shalt make the girdle of needlework.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Aaroona qoliyaa liiqo liinuwaappe dadda; huuphiyan xaaxiyo shaashiyaakka liinuwaappe giigissa. Qassi danccuwaa xilppiyan alleeqissiyaagan sikissa.

English_Sentences: And for Aaron's sons thou shalt make coats, and thou shalt make for them girdles, and bonnets shalt thou make for them, for glory and for beauty.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aaroona naatuyyo bonchchonne alleeqo gidana mala, qoleta, danccotanne huuphiyan xaaxiyo shaasheta giigissa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put them upon Aaron thy brother, and his sons with him; and shalt anoint them, and consecrate them, and sanctify them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni ha maayota ne ishaa Aaroonanne a naata maizzidoogaappe guyyiyan, eti qeesetettan taayyo oottana mala eta tiya; tiyada eti qeese gididi taayyo oottana mala eta dummaya.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make them linen breeches to cover their nakedness; from the loins even unto the thighs they shall reach:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eta kalloi kamettana mala garssaara maayiyo maayuwaa, xeessaappe biidi wodiraa gakkanau kammiyaagaa, liiqo liinuwaa qacinaappe giigissa.

English_Sentences: And they shall be upon Aaron, and upon his sons, when they come in unto the tabernacle of the congregation, or when they come near unto the altar to minister in the holy place; that they bear not iniquity, and die: it shall be a statute for ever unto him and his seed after him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooninne a naati Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo wode, woikko Geeshsha Sohuwan qeesetettan oottanau yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaa shiiqiyo wode, ha maayota maayona. Hegaadan hanikko, eti bantta bolli mooronne haiqo ehookkona. Hagee Aaroonayyoonne a zaretuyyo merinau woga gido.

English_Sentences: And this is the thing that thou shalt do unto them to hallow them, to minister unto me in the priest's office: Take one young bullock, and two rams without blemish,
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Aarooninne a naati qeese gididi taayyo oottana mala, neeni eta dummayanau hagaadan ootta; tilla bollaara de7iya issi mirgguwaanne naa77u dorssa orggeta ekka;

English_Sentences: And unleavened bread, and cakes unleavened tempered with oil, and wafers unleavened anointed with oil: of wheaten flour shalt thou make them.
Wolaitta_Sentences: muruta gisttiyaa xiilliyaa ekkada, irshshuwaa yeggennan oittaa uukka; qassi irshshuwaa yeggennan zaitiyan komppuwaa komppa; hegaadankka, irshshuwaa yeggennan lee7e lichchakkuwaa uukkada, zaitiyaa tiya.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put them into one basket, and bring them in the basket, with the bullock and the two rams.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni eta masoofiyan wottada, mirgguwaaranne naa77u dorssa orggetuura issippe taayyo shiishsha.

English_Sentences: And Aaron and his sons thou shalt bring unto the door of the tabernacle of the congregation, and shalt wash them with water.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Yaatada Aaroonanne a naata Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa pengge ehaada, haattan eta meecca.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take the garments, and put upon Aaron the coat, and the robe of the ephod, and the ephod, and the breastplate, and gird him with the curious girdle of the ephod:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan maayota ekkada, qoliyaa, eefuudiyaa bolli maayiyo adussa maayuwaa, eefuudiyaanne tiran wottiyoogaa Aaroona maizza; maizzada eefuudiyaa hiillan dadettida danccuwan gixissa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put the mitre upon his head, and put the holy crown upon the mitre.
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHaashiyaakka a huuphiyan xaaxada, GODAASSI geeshsha gididi dummatiis yaagiyaabi xaafettido alleequwaa huuphiyaa xaattaa bolli aatta.

English_Sentences: Then shalt thou take the anointing oil, and pour it upon his head, and anoint him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Tiyiyo zaitiyaakka ekkada, a huuphiyan tigada tiya.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt bring his sons, and put coats upon them.
Wolaitta_Sentences: A naatakka ehaada qoleta maizza.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt gird them with girdles, Aaron and his sons, and put the bonnets on them: and the priest's office shall be theirs for a perpetual statute: and thou shalt consecrate Aaron and his sons.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Maizzada shaashiyaakka eta huuphiyan xaaxa. Hegaappe guyyiyan Aaroonanne a naata danccuwaa danccissa. Qeesetettai etayyo merinaa wotto woga gido. Simmi Aaroonanne a naata yaatada qeese oottaasa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt cause a bullock to be brought before the tabernacle of the congregation: and Aaron and his sons shall put their hands upon the head of the bullock.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Mirgguwaa taayyo Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa sintti neeni ehin, Aarooninne a naati a huuphiyan bantta kushiyaa wottana.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt kill the bullock before the LORD, by the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Mirgguwaa Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo penggen GODAA achchan shukka.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take of the blood of the bullock, and put it upon the horns of the altar with thy finger, and pour all the blood beside the bottom of the altar.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Mirgguwaa suuttaappe amaridaagaa ne biradhdhiyan ekkada, yarshshiyoosaa bolli de7iya kaceta tiya; tiyishin attidaagaa yarshshiyoosaappe garssa baggaara gussa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take all the fat that covereth the inwards, and the caul that is above the liver, and the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, and burn them upon the altar.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan qantta ashuwaa kammida handda ubbaa, tiriyaa kammida handdaa, naa77u kilahotanne eta kamida handdaa ekkada, yarshshiyoosaa bolli wottada xuugga.

English_Sentences: But the flesh of the bullock, and his skin, and his dung, shalt thou burn with fire without the camp: it is a sin offering.
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin mirgguwaa ashuwaa, a galbbaanne a maracciyaa dirssaappe kareera xuugga; hegee nagaraa gishshau yarshshiyo yarshshuwaa.

English_Sentences: Thou shalt also take one ram; and Aaron and his sons shall put their hands upon the head of the ram.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Naa77u dorssa orggetuppe issuwaa neeni ekkin, Aarooninne a naati bantta kushiyaa a huuphiyan wottona.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt slay the ram, and thou shalt take his blood, and sprinkle it round about upon the altar.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatobare dorssa orggiyaa shukkada, suuttaa yarshshiyoosaa miyyiyan ubbasaara caccafa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt cut the ram in pieces, and wash the inwards of him, and his legs, and put them unto his pieces, and unto his head.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dorssa orggiyaayyo ashuwaa qanxxerettada, qantta ashuwaanne gedaa meecca; meeccada huuphiyaa bollinne hara qommo ashotu bolli eta wotta;

English_Sentences: And thou shalt burn the whole ram upon the altar: it is a burnt offering unto the LORD: it is a sweet savour, an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: hegaappe guyyiyan, dorssa orggiyaa muleera yarshshiyoosan xuugga; hegee GODAAYYO xuugettiya yarshsho, sawuwaa tonggu giya yarshshonne GODAAYYO taman yarshshiyo yarshsho.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take the other ram; and Aaron and his sons shall put their hands upon the head of the ram.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Qassi hankko dorssa orggiyaa neeni ekka; ekkin Aarooninne a naati bantta kushiyaa a huuphiyan wottana.

English_Sentences: Then shalt thou kill the ram, and take of his blood, and put it upon the tip of the right ear of Aaron, and upon the tip of the right ear of his sons, and upon the thumb of their right hand, and upon the great toe of their right foot, and sprinkle the blood upon the altar round about.
Wolaitta_Sentences: He dorssa orggiyaa shukkada, a suuttaappe amaridaagaa ekkada, Aaroonayyoonne a naatuyyo ushachcha haittatu xeeraa, eta ushachcha kushetuyyo wogga biradhdhetanne eta ushachcha tohotuyyo wogga biradhdheta tiya; hegaappe guyyiyan, attida suuttaa yarshshiyoosaa miyyiyan ubbasaara caccafa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take of the blood that is upon the altar, and of the anointing oil, and sprinkle it upon Aaron, and upon his garments, and upon his sons, and upon the garments of his sons with him: and he shall be hallowed, and his garments, and his sons, and his sons' garments with him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yarshshiyoosan de7iya suuttaappe amaridaagaanne tiyettiyo zaitiyaappekka amaridaagaa ekkada, Aaroona bollinne a maayuwaa bolli, a naatu bollinne eta maayuwaa bolli caccafa; caccafin inne a naati, eta maayoi GODAA oosuwaayyo dummatana.

English_Sentences: Also thou shalt take of the ram the fat and the rump, and the fat that covereth the inwards, and the caul above the liver, and the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, and the right shoulder; for it is a ram of consecration:
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Ha dorssa orggiyaappe modhdhuwaanne nasiyaa, qantta ashuwaa bolli de7iya handdaa, tiriyaa kammida handdaa, naa77u kilahota, eta kammida handdaaranne ushachcha gedaara neeni ekka; hagee qeesetettaa sunttaa immiyo wode shukkiyo dorssaa.

English_Sentences: And one loaf of bread, and one cake of oiled bread, and one wafer out of the basket of the unleavened bread that is before the LORD:
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAA sinttan wottido irshshoi gelibeenna oittaa, masoofiyaappe zaitee walahettibeenna oittaa, zaitiyaara uukkido issi komppuwaanne issi lee7e lichchakkuwaa ekka.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put all in the hands of Aaron, and in the hands of his sons; and shalt wave them for a wave offering before the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni ha katta ubbaa Aaroona kushiyaaninne a naatu kushiyan wotta; wottobare eti wuxaawuxiyo yarshsho oottidi GODAA sinttan pudenne dugenne wuxaawuxona.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt receive them of their hands, and burn them upon the altar for a burnt offering, for a sweet savour before the LORD: it is an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan eta kushiyaappe hageeta ekkada, yarshshiyoosaa bolli wottada, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaara gattada, GODAA sawuwaa tonggu gaanaadan, yarshshiyoosaa bolli taman xuugga.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take the breast of the ram of Aaron's consecration, and wave it for a wave offering before the LORD: and it shall be thy part.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni qeese gididi sunttettiyo wode shukkido dorssa orggiyaa anggaasuwaa ekkada, GODAA sinttan wuxaawuxiyo yarshshodan wuxaawuxa; hegee inttena gakkiya shaaho gidana.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt sanctify the breast of the wave offering, and the shoulder of the heave offering, which is waved, and which is heaved up, of the ram of the consecration, even of that which is for Aaron, and of that which is for his sons:
Wolaitta_Sentences: "He shukkido dorssaa ashuwaa qommotikka: yarshsho oottidi wuxaawuxido anggaasuwaanne GODAA sinttan tookkido gedaa dummaya; hegeeti Aaroonayyoonne a naatuyyo shaaho gidana.

English_Sentences: And it shall be Aaron's and his sons' by a statute for ever from the children of Israel: for it is an heave offering: and it shall be an heave offering from the children of Israel of the sacrifice of their peace offerings, even their heave offering unto the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Israa7eelati GODAAYYO immiyo issippetettaa yarshshoi, ubbatonkka Israa7eela asaappe Aaroonanne a naata gakkiya shaaho gido.

English_Sentences: And the holy garments of Aaron shall be his sons' after him, to be anointed therein, and to be consecrated in them.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Aaroona qeesetettaa maayoi appe guyyiyan a zaretussi de7o; tiyettidi qeese gidiyo wode, ha maayuwaa maayona.

English_Sentences: And that son that is priest in his stead shall put them on seven days, when he cometh into the tabernacle of the congregation to minister in the holy place.
Wolaitta_Sentences: A naatuppe a sohuwan qeese gididi, Geeshsha Sohuwan oottanau Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa yiya na7ai, he maayuwaa laappun gallassau maayo.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take the ram of the consecration, and seethe his flesh in the holy place.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Aarooninne a naati qeese gididi sunttettiyo wode shukettida dorssaa orggiyaa ashuwaa ekkada, geeshsha sohuwan doissa.

English_Sentences: And Aaron and his sons shall eat the flesh of the ram, and the bread that is in the basket, by the door of the tabernacle of the congregation.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooninne a naati dorssa orggiyaa ashuwaanne masoofiyan de7iya oittaa Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo penggen moona.

English_Sentences: And they shall eat those things wherewith the atonement was made, to consecrate and to sanctify them: but a stranger shall not eat thereof, because they are holy.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti qeese gididi sunttettiyo wodenne dummatiyo wode, nagarai atto geetettanaadan yarshshettida ha yarshshota moona. SHin he yarshshoti geeshsha gidido gishshau, hara asi oonne mooppo.

English_Sentences: And if ought of the flesh of the consecrations, or of the bread, remain unto the morning, then thou shalt burn the remainder with fire: it shall not be eaten, because it is holy.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qeese gididi sunttettiyo wode shukkido dorssa orggiyaa ashuwaappe woikko oittaappe maallado gakkanaassi palahidi aqikko, taman xuugetto; geeshsha gidido gishshau meetettoppo.

English_Sentences: And thus shalt thou do unto Aaron, and to his sons, according to all things which I have commanded thee: seven days shalt thou consecrate them.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Aarooninne a naati qeese gididi sunttettiyo wode wottiyo wogaa likke taani nena azazidoogaadan oottada, laappun gallassaa garssan pola.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt offer every day a bullock for a sin offering for atonement: and thou shalt cleanse the altar, when thou hast made an atonement for it, and thou shalt anoint it, to sanctify it.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Nagarai atto geetettanaadan hachchi hachchi nagara yarshshodan issi mirgguwaa yarshsha. Hegan yarshshiyoosaa geeshsha; yaatada yarshshiyoosaa dummayanau tiya.

English_Sentences: Seven days thou shalt make an atonement for the altar, and sanctify it; and it shall be an altar most holy: whatsoever toucheth the altar shall be holy.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yarshshiyoosaa nagaraa atto giyo wogaa laappun gallassan polada, a dummaya. Yaatobare yarshshiyoosai aadhdhida geeshsha soho gidana. A bochchiya ubbaikka geeyyana.

English_Sentences: Now this is that which thou shalt offer upon the altar; two lambs of the first year day by day continually.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Yarshshiyoosan neeni hachchi hachchi shiishshana yarshshoi hagaa. Yelettoosappe issi laitta gakkido naa77u dorssa orggeta yarshsha.

English_Sentences: The one lamb thou shalt offer in the morning; and the other lamb thou shalt offer at even:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Dorssa orggetuppe issuwaa maallado, qassi naa77anttuwaa omarssi yarshsha.

English_Sentences: And with the one lamb a tenth deal of flour mingled with the fourth part of an hin of beaten oil; and the fourth part of an hin of wine for a drink offering.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Koiro dorssa maraara issi kilo giraame gidiya muruta gisttiyaa xiilliyaa issi litiro zaitiyan munaqqada yarshsha; issi litiro woiniyaa eessaakka ushshaa yarshsho oottada yarshsha.

English_Sentences: And the other lamb thou shalt offer at even, and shalt do thereto according to the meat offering of the morning, and according to the drink offering thereof, for a sweet savour, an offering made by fire unto the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Naa77antto dorssa orggiyaa omarssi yarshshaidda maalladoogaa keena, xiilliyaa, zaitiyaanne woine eessaa shiishsha. Hegee GODAAYYO taman yarshshettiya, sawuwaa tonggu giya yarshsho gidana.

English_Sentences: This shall be a continual burnt offering throughout your generations at the door of the tabernacle of the congregation before the LORD: where I will meet you, to speak there unto thee.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Ha xuuggiyo yarshshoi yiya yeleta ubban Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo penggiyan GODAA sinttan paci bainnan yarshshettanau koshshees. Taani yan gaittada, nenaara haasayana.

English_Sentences: And there I will meet with the children of Israel, and the tabernacle shall be sanctified by my glory.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi yan taani Israa7eelatuura gaittana; ta bonchchoikka he sohuwaa dumma soho kessana.

English_Sentences: And I will sanctify the tabernacle of the congregation, and the altar: I will sanctify also both Aaron and his sons, to minister to me in the priest's office.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, taani Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaanne yarshshiyoosaa dummayana; eti taayyo qeese gididi taayyo oottana mala, Aaroonanne a naata taani dummayana.

English_Sentences: And I will dwell among the children of Israel, and will be their God.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatada taani Israa7eelatu giddon de7ana; qassi taani eta Xoossaa gidana.

English_Sentences: And they shall know that I am the LORD their God, that brought them forth out of the land of Egypt, that I may dwell among them: I am the LORD their God.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani eta giddon de7ana mala, Gibxxeppe eta kessida GODAA eta Xoossaa gidiyoogaa eti erana. Ee, taani GODAA eta Xoossaa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make an altar to burn incense upon: of shittim wood shalt thou make it.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Ixaanaa cuwayiyo saaxiniyaa guuganttaappe medhdha;

English_Sentences: A cubit shall be the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof; foursquare shall it be: and two cubits shall be the height thereof: the horns thereof shall be of the same.
Wolaitta_Sentences: ayyo oiddu zoozee de7o; zananai issi wara, gomppai issi wara, geesai qassi naa77u wara gido; kacetikka aara issuwaa gididi oiqetti merettona.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold, the top thereof, and the sides thereof round about, and the horns thereof; and thou shalt make unto it a crown of gold round about.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ayyo bolla doonaa, oiddu miyye ubbaanne a kaceta walahi bainna worqqan sheeshsha; a yuushuwankka worqqa tigettaa yuushsha aatta.

English_Sentences: And two golden rings shalt thou make to it under the crown of it, by the two corners thereof, upon the two sides of it shalt thou make it; and they shall be for places for the staves to bear it withal.
Wolaitta_Sentences: He worqqa tigettaappe garssaara ixaanaa cuwayiyo saaxiniyaayyo worqqaappe naa77u sagaayota medhdha; yaatada ya baggaaranne ha baggaara naa77aa naa77aa oitta. Hegeeti tokkiyo wode kasota aattanaassi maaddanaassa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make the staves of shittim wood, and overlay them with gold.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kasota guuganttaappe kessada, eta worqqan sheeshsha.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt put it before the vail that is by the ark of the testimony, before the mercy seat that is over the testimony, where I will meet with thee.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ha yarshshiyoosaa Maachchaa Taabootaa sinttan kaqettida magalashuwaappe kare baggaara, hegaakka taani nenaara gaittiyo Maachchaa Taabootaa bolli de7iya atto giyo sohuwaa qum77uwaa sinttan wotta.

English_Sentences: And Aaron shall burn thereon sweet incense every morning: when he dresseth the lamps, he shall burn incense upon it.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Aarooni maallado maallado xomppeta giigissanau yiyo wode, sawiya ixaanaa yarshshiyoosan cuwayo.

English_Sentences: And when Aaron lighteth the lamps at even, he shall burn incense upon it, a perpetual incense before the LORD throughout your generations.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni omarssi xomppeta poo7issiyo wode, zaarettidikka ixaanaa cuwayo; yaatikko, ixaanai GODAA sinttan yiya yeletau ubbatoo cuwattana.

English_Sentences: Ye shall offer no strange incense thereon, nor burnt sacrifice, nor meat offering; neither shall ye pour drink offering thereon.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ha yarshshiyoosan hara ai ixaananne, woikko xuugiyo yarshsho, woikko katta yarshsho yarshshoppa; ushshaa yarshshuwaakka a bolli tigoppo.

English_Sentences: And Aaron shall make an atonement upon the horns of it once in a year with the blood of the sin offering of atonements: once in the year shall he make atonement upon it throughout your generations: it is most holy unto the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni laittaappe issiton nagaraappe maarettanau shukkiyo mehiyaa suuttaa ekkidi, he yarshshiyoosaa bolli de7iya kacetu bolli wotto. Yaatidi geeshshiyo wogaa polo. Ha wogai sinttaara yaana wodetu ubban laittan laittan poletto. Yaatobare ha yarshshiyoosai GODAAYYO dummati geeyidaagaa gido" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English_Sentences: When thou takest the sum of the children of Israel after their number, then shall they give every man a ransom for his soul unto the LORD, when thou numberest them; that there be no plague among them, when thou numberest them.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Neeni Israa7eela asaa qoodan ekkanau eta paidiyo wode, issi issi urai qoodettidi, ba shemppuwaa wozanau GODAAYYO miishshaa qanxxo; qanxxikko neeni eta qoodiyo wode, eta bolli boshi yeenna.

English_Sentences: This they shall give, every one that passeth among them that are numbered, half a shekel after the shekel of the sanctuary: (a shekel is twenty gerahs:) an half shekel shall be the offering of the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qoodan geliya asai huuphiyan huuphiyan Dunkkaaniyan eriyo meezaanaa likkiyan issi issi xaqara biraa qanxxo. Issi issi urai hagaa taayyo imo oottidi immo.

English_Sentences: Every one that passeth among them that are numbered, from twenty years old and above, shall give an offering unto the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qoodan geliya asai laittai laatamaa kumidoogeenne hegaappe bolla ubbai, GODAAYYO immiyoobaa eho.

English_Sentences: The rich shall not give more, and the poor shall not give less than half a shekel, when they give an offering unto the LORD, to make an atonement for your souls.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Intte intte shemppuwaa wozanau GODAAYYO imuwaa immishin, dureekka manqqoikka issi likke immanaappe attin, duree darissidi woikko manqqoi guuttidi immoppo.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt take the atonement money of the children of Israel, and shalt appoint it for the service of the tabernacle of the congregation; that it may be a memorial unto the children of Israel before the LORD, to make an atonement for your souls.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Nagaraappe maarettanau qanxxiyo miishshaa Israa7eela asaappe ekkada, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa giddo oosuwaassi peeshsha. Ha miishshai intte shemppuwaa wozanau, GODAA sinttan Israa7eela asaabaa hassayiyoobaa gidana" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English_Sentences: Thou shalt also make a laver of brass, and his foot also of brass, to wash withal: and thou shalt put it between the tabernacle of the congregation and the altar, and thou shalt put water therein.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Meechcha keriyaanne a wottiyoogaa nahaasiyaappe medhdha; medhdhada Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaappenne yarshshiyoosaappe gidduwan wotta; wottada an haattaa tiga.

English_Sentences: For Aaron and his sons shall wash their hands and their feet thereat:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Tigin Aarooninne a naati bantta kushiyaanne bantta tohuwaa meecettana.

English_Sentences: When they go into the tabernacle of the congregation, they shall wash with water, that they die not; or when they come near to the altar to minister, to burn offering made by fire unto the LORD:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti haiqqenna mala, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa geliyo wode, audenne he haattan meecettona. Qassi GODAAYYO taman yarshshuwaa yarshshanaayyo yarshshiyoosaa mati shiiqido wode,

English_Sentences: So they shall wash their hands and their feet, that they die not: and it shall be a statute for ever to them, even to him and to his seed throughout their generations.
Wolaitta_Sentences: eti haiqqenna mala, bantta kushiyaanne bantta tohuwaa meecettona. Hagee Aaroonassinne a zaretussi, yiya yeleta ubbaassi merinau woga gidana" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: Moreover the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English_Sentences: Take thou also unto thee principal spices, of pure myrrh five hundred shekels, and of sweet cinnamon half so much, even two hundred and fifty shekels, and of sweet calamus two hundred and fifty shekels,
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Muruta qimameta, hegeetikka, usuppun kilo giraame gukkiya karbbiyaa, heezzu kilo giraame sawiya qarafaa, heezzu kilo giraame sawiya gucachchaanne

English_Sentences: And of cassia five hundred shekels, after the shekel of the sanctuary, and of oil olive an hin:
Wolaitta_Sentences: usuppun kilo giraame zimbbaanuwaa ekka. Ha ubbaikka Dunkkaaniyan eriyo meezaanaa likkiyan gido. Hegaa bollikka oiddu litiro zaitiyaa gujja.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make it an oil of holy ointment, an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary: it shall be an holy anointing oil.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hageeta shittuwaa oottiyo eran wolakkada, sawiya geeshsha tiyettiyo zaite kessa.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt anoint the tabernacle of the congregation therewith, and the ark of the testimony,
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatada Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa, Maachchaa Taabootaa,

English_Sentences: And the table and all his vessels, and the candlestick and his vessels, and the altar of incense,
Wolaitta_Sentences: xaraphpheezaanne a bolli wottiyo miishsha ubbaa, xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaanne a miishshata, ixaanaa cuwayiyo saaxiniyaa,

English_Sentences: And the altar of burnt offering with all his vessels, and the laver and his foot.
Wolaitta_Sentences: xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaanne an de7iya ubba miishshata, meechcha keriyaanne a wottiyoogaa tiya.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt sanctify them, that they may be most holy: whatsoever toucheth them shall be holy.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti aadhdhida keehi geeshsha gidana mala, neeni eta dummaya; eta bochchiyaabai ubbaikka geeshsha gidana.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt anoint Aaron and his sons, and consecrate them, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Hegaappe guyyiyan Aarooninne a naati qeese gididi taayyo oottana mala, eta tiya; tiyada dummaya;

English_Sentences: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying, This shall be an holy anointing oil unto me throughout your generations.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Israa7eela asaayyo hagaadan yaagada yoota; Hagee yiya yeletaassikka tiyettiyo ta geeshsha zaite gido;

English_Sentences: Upon man's flesh shall it not be poured, neither shall ye make any other like it, after the composition of it: it is holy, and it shall be holy unto you.
Wolaitta_Sentences: ha zaitiyaa asa bollan gussoppa; qassi ai zaitekka hegaa oottido likkiyan oottoppa. I geeshsha gidido gishshau, inttekka a geeshshabaadan qoppite.

English_Sentences: Whosoever compoundeth any like it, or whosoever putteth any of it upon a stranger, shall even be cut off from his people.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hagaa mala shittuwaa giigissiya urinne qeese gidenna hara asa tiyiya uri ooninne ba asaa giddoppe bohetto yaaga" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Take unto thee sweet spices, stacte, and onycha, and galbanum; these sweet spices with pure frankincense: of each shall there be a like weight:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis; "Sawiya qimameta: mittaa cooshshaa, xaadhdhiyaa keettan de7iya shittuwaa, sawiya shidaanne sawiya ixaanaa ekka; eta ubbaa yesoikka issi likke gido.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt make it a perfume, a confection after the art of the apothecary, tempered together, pure and holy:
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHittuwaadan walahettida ixaanaa oottada, etan go7etta; walahi bainnabaanne geeshsha gidanaadan, an maxiniyaa yegga.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt beat some of it very small, and put of it before the testimony in the tabernacle of the congregation, where I will meet with thee: it shall be unto you most holy.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Appe amaridaagaa ekkada liiqissada cadda; yaatada taani nenaara gaittiyo Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa giddon Maachchaa Taabootaa sinttan wotta. Yaatobare i neeyyo ubbaappe aadhdhida geeshsha gidana.

English_Sentences: And as for the perfume which thou shalt make, ye shall not make to yourselves according to the composition thereof: it shall be unto thee holy for the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hagaa medhdhidoogaa likkiyan hara ixaanaa medhdhoppite. Hegee taayyo dumma geeshshabaa gidiyoogaa erite.

English_Sentences: Whosoever shall make like unto that, to smell thereto, shall even be cut off from his people.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hagaa milatiyaabaa medhdhidi, a sawuwaa singgidi ufaittanau koyiya uri de7ikko, i ba asaa giddoppe bohetto" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis;

English_Sentences: See, I have called by name Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah:
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Be7a; taani Yihudaa zare gidiya Huura na7aa na7aa, Uura na7aa, Baxaali7eela dooraas.

English_Sentences: And I have filled him with the spirit of God, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of workmanship,
Wolaitta_Sentences: A taani Xoossaa Ayyaanan, hiillan, akeekaaninne ooso ubbaa oottiyo eran kunttaas;

English_Sentences: To devise cunning works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass,
Wolaitta_Sentences: hegeekka hiillan oosuwaa halchchuwaa kessiiddi, worqqaappe, biraappenne nahaasiyaappe dumma dummabaa i oottanaassa.

English_Sentences: And in cutting of stones, to set them, and in carving of timber, to work in all manner of workmanship.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaadankka, al77o shuchchaa massidi giigissanaassa, mittaa massanaassanne hara ooso ubbaa i oottanaassa.

English_Sentences: And I, behold, I have given with him Aholiab, the son of Ahisamach, of the tribe of Dan: and in the hearts of all that are wise hearted I have put wisdom, that they may make all that I have commanded thee;
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Hegaa bollikka qassi a maaddana mala, Daana zare gidiya Ahisamaaka na7aa Oholi7aaba sunttaas. Taani nena azazidobaa ubbaa eti oottana mala, kushe hiilla eriyaageetussi ubbatussi eratettaa immaas.

English_Sentences: The tabernacle of the congregation, and the ark of the testimony, and the mercy seat that is thereupon, and all the furniture of the tabernacle,
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti oottanabati: Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa, Maachchaa Taabootaa, a bolli wottiyo atto giyo sohuwaa qum77uwaa, Xoossaa Dunkkaaniyaa giddon go7ettiyo miishsha ubbaa,

English_Sentences: And the table and his furniture, and the pure candlestick with all his furniture, and the altar of incense,
Wolaitta_Sentences: xaraphpheezaanne a miishshata, xomppiyaa wottiyo ballaa walahi bainna worqqaappe oosettidaagaanne a miishsha ubbaara, ixaanaa cuwayiyo saaxiniyaa,

English_Sentences: And the altar of burnt offering with all his furniture, and the laver and his foot,
Wolaitta_Sentences: xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoosaanne a miishsha ubbaara, meecettiyo keriyaanne a wottiyoogaara,

English_Sentences: And the cloths of service, and the holy garments for Aaron the priest, and the garments of his sons, to minister in the priest's office,
Wolaitta_Sentences: dadettida maayuwaa, qeese ubbatu halaqai Aarooni maayana qeesetettaa maayotanne a attuma naati qeesetettaa oottiiddi maayana maayuwaa,

English_Sentences: And the anointing oil, and sweet incense for the holy place: according to all that I have commanded thee shall they do.
Wolaitta_Sentences: qassi tiyettiyo zaitiyaanne Geeshsha Sohuwaayyo sawuwaa tonggu giya ixaanaa. Eti hagaa ubbaa taani nena azazidoogaadan oottona" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagidi azaziis;

English_Sentences: Speak thou also unto the children of Israel, saying, Verily my sabbaths ye shall keep: for it is a sign between me and you throughout your generations; that ye may know that I am the LORD that doth sanctify you.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Israa7eela asaa neeni, Ta Sambbataa naagite. Hegee taani GODAI inttena taassi geeshsha oottada dooridoogaa bessiyaagaa gididi, yaana yeleta ubbau taappenne intteppe gidduwan malaata gidana.

English_Sentences: Ye shall keep the sabbath therefore; for it is holy unto you: every one that defileth it shall surely be put to death: for whosoever doeth any work therein, that soul shall be cut off from among his people.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Intteyyo i geeshsha gidiyo gishshau, Sambbataa bonchchite. A tunissiya asai ubbai mule haiqqo; he gallassan ooso oottiya ooninne ba asaa giddoppe bohetto.

English_Sentences: Six days may work be done; but in the seventh is the sabbath of rest, holy to the LORD: whosoever doeth any work in the sabbath day, he shall surely be put to death.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Usuppun gallassatun neeni oosuwaa ootta; shin laappuntta gallassai GODAAYYO dummatida shemppo Sambbata; Sambbata gallassan ai oosonne oottiya ooninne haiqqo.

English_Sentences: Wherefore the children of Israel shall keep the sabbath, to observe the sabbath throughout their generations, for a perpetual covenant.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Israa7eelati ha Sambbata gallassaa yeletaappe yeletau merinaa malaata oottidi bonchchona.

English_Sentences: It is a sign between me and the children of Israel for ever: for in six days the LORD made heaven and earth, and on the seventh day he rested, and was refreshed.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani usuppun gallassatun saluwaanne sa7aa medhdhido gishshaunne qassi laappuntta gallassan taani oosuwaa aggada shemppido gishshau, ta gidduwaaninne Israa7eelatu gidduwan hagee merinau malaata gidana yaaga" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he gave unto Moses, when he had made an end of communing with him upon mount Sinai, two tables of testimony, tables of stone, written with the finger of God.
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muuseyyo Siinaa Deriyaa bollan haasayiyoogaa wurssido wode, i ba biradhdhiyan xaafido tammu azazota oiqqida naa77u masettida shuchchata Muuseyyo immiis.

English_Sentences: And when the people saw that Moses delayed to come down out of the mount, the people gathered themselves together unto Aaron, and said unto him, Up, make us gods, which shall go before us; for as for this Moses, the man that brought us up out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Asai Muusee deriyaappe wodhdhennan keehi gam77idoogaa be7ido wode, Aaroona yuushuwan shiiqidi, "Haaya; neeni nuna kaalettiya xoossata nuuyyo medhdha. Gibxxe biittaappe nuna kessida Muusa gidikko, i waaniichchidaakkonne nuuni erokko!" yaagidosona.

English_Sentences: And Aaron said unto them, Break off the golden earrings, which are in the ears of your wives, of your sons, and of your daughters, and bring them unto me.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Aarooni eta, "Intte keettaayetu haittaaninne intte attuma naatunne macca naatu haittan de7iya worqqaa kessidi, taayyo ekki ehiite" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And all the people brake off the golden earrings which were in their ears, and brought them unto Aaron.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan asai ubbai ba haittaa worqqaa kessidi, Aaroonayyo ehiidosona.

English_Sentences: And he received them at their hand, and fashioned it with a graving tool, after he had made it a molten calf: and they said, These be thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ehin i hegaa eta kushiyaappe ekkidi, seerissiis; seerissidoogaappe guyyiyan qoxxiyooban qoxxidi, mara milatiya eeqa oottidi medhdhiis. Medhdhin asai, "Israa7eelatoo, inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessida intte xoossati hageeta" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And when Aaron saw it, he built an altar before it; and Aaron made proclamation, and said, To morrow is a feast to the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni hagaa be7ido wode, he maraa sinttan yarshshiyoosaa gimbbidi, "Wontto GODAA baalaa gallassa gidana" yaagidi erissiis.

English_Sentences: And they rose up early on the morrow, and offered burnt offerings, and brought peace offerings; and the people sat down to eat and to drink, and rose up to play.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, wonttetta gallassi asai guuran denddidi, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa shiishshiis; issippetettaa yarshshuwaakka yarshshiis. Yaatidi asai maanaunne uyanau uttiis. Mi uyi simmidi, qassi duranau denddiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Go, get thee down; for thy people, which thou broughtest out of the land of Egypt, have corrupted themselves:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaanin GODAI Muusa, "Neeni eesuwan duge wodhdha; aissi giikko, ne asai, neeni Gibxxeppe kessada ehiidoogee nagaraa oottidi, bantta huuphiyaa tunissiichchidosona.

English_Sentences: They have turned aside quickly out of the way which I commanded them: they have made them a molten calf, and have worshipped it, and have sacrificed thereunto, and said, These be thy gods, O Israel, which have brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani eta azazido ogiyaappe eti eesuwan sher77i giichchidosona. Worqqaa seerissidoogaa mara malatissidi, banttau eeqaa medhdhidosona. Medhdhidi ayyo goinnidosona; ayyo yarshshidosona. Eti, Israa7eelatoo, inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessida intte xoossati hageeta yaagidosona" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, I have seen this people, and, behold, it is a stiffnecked people:
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa, "Taani ha asaa be7aas; eti morgge zozzida asa.

English_Sentences: Now therefore let me alone, that my wrath may wax hot against them, and that I may consume them: and I will make of thee a great nation.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ha77i ta hanqqoi eta bolli eexxi kiyin, taani eta xaissanaagaa neeni tana diggoppa. Yaatada taani nena gita kawotetta oottana" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And Moses besought the LORD his God, and said, LORD, why doth thy wrath wax hot against thy people, which thou hast brought forth out of the land of Egypt with great power, and with a mighty hand?
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin Muusee GODAA ba Xoossaa hagaadan yaagidi woossiis; "Abeet GODAU, neeni ne gita wolqqaaninne ne mino kushiyan Gibxxeppe kessada ehiido ne asaa bolli ne hanqqoi aissi eexxi kiyii?

English_Sentences: Wherefore should the Egyptians speak, and say, For mischief did he bring them out, to slay them in the mountains, and to consume them from the face of the earth? Turn from thy fierce wrath, and repent of this evil against thy people.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Gibxxeti, GODAI eta deretu bollan woranaunne biittaappe pitti xaissanau, iita halchchuwan kessiis aibissi giyoonaa? Ne yashshiya hanqquwaappe simma; ne asaa xaissanau qoppoogaa aggaaga.

English_Sentences: Remember Abraham, Isaac, and Israel, thy servants, to whom thou swarest by thine own self, and saidst unto them, I will multiply your seed as the stars of heaven, and all this land that I have spoken of will I give unto your seed, and they shall inherit it for ever.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ne ailleta Abrahaama, Yisaaqanne Yaaqooba hassaya; neeni etassi, Taani intte zariyaa saluwaa xoolinttetudan darissana; ha taani intteyyo immana giido biittaa ubbaakka intte zariyaayyo immana; eti he biittaa merinau laattana gaada ne huuphiyan neeni caaqqido qaalaa hassaya" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD repented of the evil which he thought to do unto his people.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI ba asaa bolli iitabaa ehaanau qoppidoogaa aggidi, eta maariis.

English_Sentences: And Moses turned, and went down from the mount, and the two tables of the testimony were in his hand: the tables were written on both their sides; on the one side and on the other were they written.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Muusee tammu azazoti etan xaafetti uttido naa77u masettida shuchchata ba kushiyan oiqqidi, deriyaappe duge wodhdhiis. He shuchchati naa77u baggaarakka xaafettidosona.

English_Sentences: And the tables were the work of God, and the writing was the writing of God, graven upon the tables.
Wolaitta_Sentences: He masettida shuchchata giigissidaagee Xoossaa; shuchchaa bolli woocidi xaafidaageekka Xoossaa.

English_Sentences: And when Joshua heard the noise of the people as they shouted, he said unto Moses, There is a noise of war in the camp.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaasu asaa wocamaa siyido wode, Muusa hagaadan yaagiis; "Dunkkaanidosan ola waasoi siyettees" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he said, It is not the voice of them that shout for mastery, neither is it the voice of them that cry for being overcome: but the noise of them that sing do I hear.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Muusee zaaridi, "Taani siyiyoogee hagee yettappe attin, xoonidaageetu cenggurssa woikko xoonettidaageetu cenggurssa gidenna" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And it came to pass, as soon as he came nigh unto the camp, that he saw the calf, and the dancing: and Moses' anger waxed hot, and he cast the tables out of his hands, and brake them beneath the mount.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee dunkkaanidosaa matido wode, maraanne durssaa be7idi keehi hanqqettiis; hanqqettidi ba kushiyan oiqqido masettida shuchchata deriyaa xaphuwan olidi mentterettiis.

English_Sentences: And he took the calf which they had made, and burnt it in the fire, and ground it to powder, and strawed it upon the water, and made the children of Israel drink of it.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti medhdhido maraakka ekkidi, taman xuuggiis; hegaappe guyyiyan liiqana gakkanaashin gaacciis; gaaccidi haattaa bolli laalidi, Israa7eela asai uyanaadan oottiis.

English_Sentences: And Moses said unto Aaron, What did this people unto thee, that thou hast brought so great a sin upon them?
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Muusee Aaroona, "Ha asai nena waatiinee neeni eta hagaa mala gita nagarau kaalettidoi?" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And Aaron said, Let not the anger of my lord wax hot: thou knowest the people, that they are set on mischief.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aaroonikka zaaridi, "Ta godau, hanqqettoppa; ha asai iitaa oottanau ai keena koyiyaakko neeni eraasa.

English_Sentences: For they said unto me, Make us gods, which shall go before us: for as for this Moses, the man that brought us up out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti tana, Nuna kaalettiya xoossata nuussi medhdha. Aissi giikko, ha nuna Gibxxeppe ehiida Muusee i waanidaakkonne nuuni erokko! yaagidosona.

English_Sentences: And I said unto them, Whosoever hath any gold, let them break it off. So they gave it me: then I cast it into the fire, and there came out this calf.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin taani eta, Intte bolli de7iya worqqaa kessidi, hammite yaagaas. Hegaappe guyyiyan eti taayyo immido worqqaa taani taman yeggin, ha marai kiyiis" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And when Moses saw that the people were naked; (for Aaron had made them naked unto their shame among their enemies:)
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni asaa gede coo yeddi aggin, asai ba morkketu sinttan kauyyidi karettidoogaa Muusee be7iis.

English_Sentences: Then Moses stood in the gate of the camp, and said, Who is on the LORD's side? let him come unto me. And all the sons of Levi gathered themselves together unto him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Muusee dunkkaanidosaa geliyo penggiyan eqqidi hagaadan yaagiis; "GODAA bagga gidiya asi ooninne taakko yo!" yaagiis. Yaagin Leewati ubbai akko shiiqidosona.

English_Sentences: And he said unto them, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Put every man his sword by his side, and go in and out from gate to gate throughout the camp, and slay every man his brother, and every man his companion, and every man his neighbour.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan i eta, "GODAI Israa7eela Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; Asai ubbai bisuwaa ba xeessan xeessan gixxo; gixxidi dunkkaanidosan gaxaappe gaxaa gakkanaashin, guyyenne sinttaunne simeretto; issoi issoi ba ishaa, ba laggiyaanne ba shooruwaa woro yaagees" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the children of Levi did according to the word of Moses: and there fell of the people that day about three thousand men.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Leewati Muusee azazidoogaadan oottidosona; he gallassi asaappe heezzu sha7aa keenai haiqqiis.

English_Sentences: For Moses had said, Consecrate yourselves today to the LORD, even every man upon his son, and upon his brother; that he may bestow upon you a blessing this day.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Muusee Leewata, "Hachchi intte GODAAYYO dummatideta; aissi giikko, intte intte naatanne intte ishata woranaukka azazettideta; hachchi GODAI inttena anjjiis" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And it came to pass on the morrow, that Moses said unto the people, Ye have sinned a great sin: and now I will go up unto the LORD; peradventure I shall make an atonement for your sin.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi Muusee asaa, "Intte gita nagaraa oottideta; shin ha77i taani GODAAKKO pude deriyaa kiyana; geelladan intte nagaraa taani atto giissanaakkonne" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And Moses returned unto the LORD, and said, Oh, this people have sinned a great sin, and have made them gods of gold.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin Muusee GODAAKKO simmidi biidi hagaadan yaagiis; "Ha asai gita nagaraa oottiis; eti banttayyo worqqaappe xoossata medhdhidosona.

English_Sentences: Yet now, if thou wilt forgive their sin--; and if not, blot me, I pray thee, out of thy book which thou hast written.
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin hayyanaa, ha77i eta nagaraa atto yaaga; hegee xayikko, neeni xaafido mazggabaappe tana qucca" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Whosoever hath sinned against me, him will I blot out of my book.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI zaaridi Muusa, "Taani ta mazggabaappe quccanaagee ta bolli nagaraa oottida asatu sunttaa.

English_Sentences: Therefore now go, lead the people unto the place of which I have spoken unto thee: behold, mine Angel shall go before thee: nevertheless in the day when I visit I will visit their sin upon them.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ha77i baada, ha asaa taani neeyyo yootido sohuwaa kaaletta; ta kiitanchchaikka nena kaalettana; shin taani qaxxayanau wodee gakkin, eta eta nagaraa gishshau qaxxayana" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD plagued the people, because they made the calf, which Aaron made.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooni worqqaappe maraa misiliyaa medhdhanaadan asai giddido gishshau, GODAI asaa bolli gita boshaa yeddiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Depart, and go up hence, thou and the people which thou hast brought up out of the land of Egypt, unto the land which I sware unto Abraham, to Isaac, and to Jacob, saying, Unto thy seed will I give it:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeninne neeni Gibxxeppe kessido asai ha sohuwaappe denddite; denddidi, Taani intte yaratussi immana yaagada wottido biittaa biite. He biittai taani Abrahaamayyo, Yisaaqayyoonne Yaaqoobayyo immana yaagada caaqqa wottido biittaa.

English_Sentences: And I will send an angel before thee; and I will drive out the Canaanite, the Amorite, and the Hittite, and the Perizzite, the Hivite, and the Jebusite:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani intte sinttan kiitanchchaa kiittada, Kanaaneta, Amooreta, Hiiteta, Parzzeta, Hiiwetanne Yaabuusata yedettana.

English_Sentences: Unto a land flowing with milk and honey: for I will not go up in the midst of thee; for thou art a stiffnecked people: lest I consume thee in the way.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Maattainne eessai goggiyo he biittaa biite. SHin intte morggee zozzido asa gidido gishshau, taani inttena ogiyan xaissargganau, inttenaara biikke" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And when the people heard these evil tidings, they mourned: and no man did put on him his ornaments.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Asai he yashshiya oduwaa siyidi keehippe yeekkiis. He wodeppe doommidi ubbaikka bar alleequwaa aattiyoogaa aggi bayiis.

English_Sentences: For the LORD had said unto Moses, Say unto the children of Israel, Ye are a stiffnecked people: I will come up into the midst of thee in a moment, and consume thee: therefore now put off thy ornaments from thee, that I may know what to do unto thee.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagi wottiis; "Israa7eela hagaadan yaaga; Intte morggee zozzido asa. Taani inttenaara harai atto guutta wodiyaa biyaakkokka, taani inttena xaissarggana. Ha77i simmi intte alleequwaa kessirggite; yaatobare taani inttena oottanabaa qachchana yaaga" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the children of Israel stripped themselves of their ornaments by the mount Horeb.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Israa7eelati Siinaa Deriyaappe doommidi bantta alleeqota kessi wottidosona.

English_Sentences: And Moses took the tabernacle, and pitched it without the camp, afar off from the camp, and called it the Tabernacle of the congregation. And it came to pass, that every one which sought the LORD went out unto the tabernacle of the congregation, which was without the camp.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee dunkkaaniyaa ekki ekkidi efiidi, asai dunkkaanosaappe kareera haassidi toliis. Tolin he dunkkaanee, "Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaa" geetettidi xeesettiis. GODAA oichchanau koyiya ubbai dunkkaanosaappe kareera de7iya Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaa bees.

English_Sentences: And it came to pass, when Moses went out unto the tabernacle, that all the people rose up, and stood every man at his tent door, and looked after Moses, until he was gone into the tabernacle.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee he dunkkaaniyaa biido wode, audenne asai ubbai denddidi, ba dunkkaaniyaa penggen penggen eqqees; eqqidi Muusee he dunkkaaniyaa gelana gakkanaashin a xeellees.

English_Sentences: And it came to pass, as Moses entered into the tabernacle, the cloudy pillar descended, and stood at the door of the tabernacle, and the Lord talked with Moses.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaa giddo gelido wode, shaaraa tuussai duge wodhdhees; wodhdhidi GODAI Muuseera haasayishin, he dunkkaaniyaa penggen takkees.

English_Sentences: And all the people saw the cloudy pillar stand at the tabernacle door: and all the people rose up and worshipped, every man in his tent door.
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHaaraa tuussaa he dunkkaaniyaa geliyo penggiyan be7ido wode ubban, asai ubbai ba penggen penggen denddi eqqidi, GODAAYYO goinnees.

English_Sentences: And the LORD spake unto Moses face to face, as a man speaketh unto his friend. And he turned again into the camp: but his servant Joshua, the son of Nun, a young man, departed not out of the tabernacle.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Asi ba laggiyaara haasayiyoogaadan GODAI Muuseera sinttan eqqidi, haasayees. Hegaappe guyyiyan Muusee asai dunkkaanidosaa guyye simmees; shin a maaddiya yelagai, Nawe na7aa Yaasu, Gaittiyo Dunkkaaniyaappe shaahettenna.

English_Sentences: And Moses said unto the LORD, See, thou sayest unto me, Bring up this people: and thou hast not let me know whom thou wilt send with me. Yet thou hast said, I know thee by name, and thou hast also found grace in my sight.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee GODAA hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni tana, Ha asaa kaaletta yaagadasa; shin tanaara neeni oona kiittiyaakko, tana erissabaakka. Neeni, Taani nena sunttan erais; neeni tanan nashettadasa yaagadasa.

English_Sentences: Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have found grace in thy sight, shew me now thy way, that I may know thee, that I may find grace in thy sight: and consider that this nation is thy people.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni tana nashshidabaa gidikko, taani nena erana malanne sinttanaukka nenan nashettada daana mala, ne ogiyaa tana tamaarissa. Ha asai ne asaa gidiyoogaa hassaya" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he said, My presence shall go with thee, and I will give thee rest.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI zaaridi, "Taani nenaara baana; taani nena shemppissana" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he said unto him, If thy presence go not with me, carry us not up hence.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin Muusee a, "Neeni nunaara beennabaa gidikko, hagaappe nuna yeddoppa.

English_Sentences: For wherein shall it be known here that I and thy people have found grace in thy sight? is it not in that thou goest with us? so shall we be separated, I and thy people, from all the people that are upon the face of the earth.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Neeni nunaara beennan xayikko, tanaaninne ne asaani neeni ufaittidoogaa asai ubbai waani eranee? Biitta ubban de7iya hara asa ubbaappe tananne ne asaa dummayiyaabi harabi aibee?" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, I will do this thing also that thou hast spoken: for thou hast found grace in my sight, and I know thee by name.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI Muusa, "Taani nenan ufaittido gishshaunne nena ne sunttan eriyo gishshau, neeni tana oichchidoogaa ubbaa taani oottana" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he said, I beseech thee, shew me thy glory.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin Muusee, "Yaanikko phooliya ne qonccettaa bonchchuwaa tana bessarkkii?" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he said, I will make all my goodness pass before thee, and I will proclaim the name of the LORD before thee; and will be gracious to whom I will be gracious, and will shew mercy on whom I will shew mercy.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin GODAI, "Taani ta phooliya bonchchuwaa qonccetta ubbaa ne sinttaara kanttissana; ta geeshsha sunttaakka ne achchan awaajjana. Taani GODAA; taani maaranau koyiyoogeeta maarana; qassi qarettanau koyiyoogeetuyyookka qarettana.

English_Sentences: And he said, Thou canst not see my face: for there shall no man see me, and live.
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin neeni ta som77uwaa be7akka; aissi giikko, ooninne tana be7idi paxa de7enna" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said, Behold, there is a place by me, and thou shalt stand upon a rock:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan GODAI, "Neeni zaallaa bolli eqqanau hagan ta matan sohoi de7ees.

English_Sentences: And it shall come to pass, while my glory passeth by, that I will put thee in a clift of the rock, and will cover thee with my hand while I pass by:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Ta bonchchoi kanttiyo wode, taani nena phalqqettida zaallaa giddon wottana; wottada taani kanttana gakkanaashin, ta kushiyan nena kammana.

English_Sentences: And I will take away mine hand, and thou shalt see my back parts: but my face shall not be seen.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan taani ta kushiyaa diggin, neeni ta zokkuwaa be7ana; shin ta som77oi beettanau bessenna" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Hew thee two tables of stone like unto the first: and I will write upon these tables the words that were in the first tables, which thou brakest.
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa hagaadan yaagiis; "Koiroogeeta milatiya naa77u shuchchata massada giigissa; yaatobare taani he masettida shuchchatu bolli kase neeni menttido shuchchatu bollan de7iya qaalata xaafana.

English_Sentences: And be ready in the morning, and come up in the morning unto mount Sinai, and present thyself there to me in the top of the mount.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Wontto maallado pude Siinaa Deriyaa kiyanau giiga; yaatada tanaara yan deriyaa huuphiyan gaitta.

English_Sentences: And no man shall come up with thee, neither let any man be seen throughout all the mount; neither let the flocks nor herds feed before that mount.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Nenaara ooninne kiyoppo; woikko deriyaa bolli awankka beettoppo; harai atto dorssaa wudee woikko mehiyaa wudeekka deriyaa sinttan heemettoppo" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he hewed two tables of stone like unto the first; and Moses rose up early in the morning, and went up unto mount Sinai, as the LORD had commanded him, and took in his hand the two tables of stone.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Muusee koiro shuchchata milatiya naa77u shuchchata massiis; massidi GODAI azazidoogaadan, shuchchata ba kushiyan oiqqidi, maallado guuraara pude Siinaa Deriyaa kiyiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD descended in the cloud, and stood with him there, and proclaimed the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kiyin GODAI shaaran duge wodhdhidi, aara yan eqqiis; eqqidi, "GODAA" yaagidi ba sunttaa awaajjiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD passed by before him, and proclaimed, The LORD, The LORD God, merciful and gracious, longsuffering, and abundant in goodness and truth,
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muuse sinttaara hagaadan yaagidi awaajjiiddi kanttiis; "Taani GODAA; taani GODAA; qaretainne maarotai kumido Xoossaa, danddayanchchaa, aggenna siiqoi daridoogaanne daro ammanettiyaagaa.

English_Sentences: Keeping mercy for thousands, forgiving iniquity and transgression and sin, and that will by no means clear the guilty; visiting the iniquity of the fathers upon the children, and upon the children's children, unto the third and to the fourth generation.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani ta aggenna siiquwaa sha7atussi naagiyaagaa; iitatettaa, makkalaanne nagaraa atto yaagiyaagaa. Gidikkokka, mooranchchaa qaxxayennan aggennaagaa; aawatu nagaraa gishshau naatanne naatu naata, heezzantto yeletaanne oiddantto yeletaa gakkanaashin qaxxayiyaagaa" yaagidi awaajjiis.

English_Sentences: And Moses made haste, and bowed his head toward the earth, and worshipped.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaagin Muusee sohuwaara biittan gufannidi goinniis;

English_Sentences: And he said, If now I have found grace in thy sight, O LORD, let my LORD, I pray thee, go among us; for it is a stiffnecked people; and pardon our iniquity and our sin, and take us for thine inheritance.
Wolaitta_Sentences: goinnidi, "Abeet Godau, neeni tanan ufaittidabaa gidikko, nunaara issippe hindda. Hagee asai morgge zozzidabaa gidikkokka, nu iitatettaanne nu nagaraa atto yaagada, nuna ne asa ootta" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he said, Behold, I make a covenant: before all thy people I will do marvels, such as have not been done in all the earth, nor in any nation: and all the people among which thou art shall see the work of the LORD: for it is a terrible thing that I will do with thee.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Yaatin GODAI hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani inttenaara maachchaa maacettais; hagaappe kase sa7a ubban de7iya kawotetta ubban hani erenna maalaalissiyaabaa ne asa ubbaa sinttan oottana; taani GODAI, intteyyo oottiyo oosoi ai keena maalaalissiyaabaakko neeni eta giddon de7iyo asai be7ana.

English_Sentences: Observe thou that which I command thee this day: behold, I drive out before thee the Amorite, and the Canaanite, and the Hittite, and the Perizzite, and the Hivite, and the Jebusite.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hachchi taani inttena azaziyo azazuwaa naagite; intte sinttappe Amooreta, Kanaaneta, Hiiteta, Parzzeta, Hiiwetanne Yaabuusata taani yedettana.

English_Sentences: Take heed to thyself, lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land whither thou goest, lest it be for a snare in the midst of thee:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti intteyyo pire gidenna mala, intte biyo biittan de7iya asaara maachchaa maacettoppite.

English_Sentences: But ye shall destroy their altars, break their images, and cut down their groves:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Eti yarshshiyo sohota qolite; eti goinniyo shuchchatakka mentterettite; qassi Asheero giyo eta macca xoossee misiletakka qanxxeretti olite.

English_Sentences: For thou shalt worship no other god: for the LORD, whose name is Jealous, is a jealous God:
Wolaitta_Sentences: Taani GODAI qanaatiya Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau, taappe hara xoossatuyyo goinnoppite.

English_Sentences: Lest thou make a covenant with the inhabitants of the land, and they go a whoring after their gods, and do sacrifice unto their gods, and one call thee, and thou eat of his sacrifice;
Wolaitta_Sentences: "He biittan de7iya asatuura aiba maachchakka maacettoppite; aissi giikko, eti tanan ammanettennan ixxidi bantta xoossata kaalliyo wodenne etayyo yarshshiyo wode, eti inttenakka shoobbana; shoobbin intte eta yarshshota maana.

English_Sentences: And thou take of their daughters unto thy sons, and their daughters go a whoring after their gods, and make thy sons go a whoring after their gods.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Qassi intte eta macca naatuppe dooridi, intte attuma naatussi immana; he wode he macca naati tanan ammanettennan ixxidi, bantta xoossata kaalliiddi, intte attuma naatakka banttaagaadan ootissana.

English_Sentences: Thou shalt make thee no molten gods.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Intteyyo goinniyo xoossata aibippekka seerissidi medhdhoppite.

English_Sentences: The feast of unleavened bread shalt thou keep. Seven days thou shalt eat unleavened bread, as I commanded thee, in the time of the month Abib: for in the month Abib thou camest out from Egypt.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Oittaa Baalaa bonchchite; taani inttena azazidoogaadan, laappun gallassau irshshoi gelennan uukettida oittaa miite; hegaakka intte Gibxxeppe kiyido Abiiba aginan oottite.

English_Sentences: All that openeth the matrix is mine; and every firstling among thy cattle, whether ox or sheep, that is male.
Wolaitta_Sentences: uluwaappe baira yelettiya attuma na7a ubbai tabaa; intte mehe ubbaappekka boora gidin, woikko dorssa gidin, bairai tabaa;

English_Sentences: But the firstling of an ass thou shalt redeem with a lamb: and if thou redeem him not, then shalt thou break his neck. All the firstborn of thy sons thou shalt redeem. And none shall appear before me empty.
Wolaitta_Sentences: koiro yelettida hare maraa dorssa maraara laammada woza; wozana xayikko, a qooriyaa menttada wora. Ne naatuppe baira yelettida attuma na7a ubbaa woza. "Ooninne immiyoobaa oiqqennan, mela kusheera ta sinttan beettoppo.

English_Sentences: Six days thou shalt work, but on the seventh day thou shalt rest: in earing time and in harvest thou shalt rest.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Usuppun gallassaa oottite; shin laappuntta gallassan shemppite; goyiyo wodiyankka qassi kattaa cakkiyo wodiyankka laappuntta gallassan shemppite.

English_Sentences: And thou shalt observe the feast of weeks, of the firstfruits of wheat harvest, and the feast of ingathering at the year's end.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Baira zerettida gisttiyaa intte cakkiyo wode, Saaminttatu Baalaa bonchchite; laittaa wurssetta kattaa shiishshiyo wodekka, SHiishuwaa Baalaa bonchchite.

English_Sentences: Thrice in the year shall all your menchildren appear before the LORD God, the God of Israel.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Laittan heezzutoo Israa7eela attuma asai ubbai Ubbaa Haariya GODAA, Israa7eela Xoossaa sinttan beettona.

English_Sentences: For I will cast out the nations before thee, and enlarge thy borders: neither shall any man desire thy land, when thou shalt go up to appear before the LORD thy God thrice in the year.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Kawotettata taani intte sinttappe yedettada kessana; yaatada intte zawaa taani aassana. GODAA intte Xoossaa sinttan intte laittan heezzutoo beettanau pude kiyiyo wode, ooninne intte biittaa amottenna.

English_Sentences: Thou shalt not offer the blood of my sacrifice with leaven; neither shall the sacrifice of the feast of the passover be left unto the morning.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Intte taayyo suutaa yarshshuwaa yarshshiyo wode, irshshuwaa yeggidi uukkido oittaara yarshshoppite. Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassaayyo yarshshido yarshshuwaappe maalladossi aibinne attoppo.

English_Sentences: The first of the firstfruits of thy land thou shalt bring unto the house of the LORD thy God. Thou shalt not seethe a kid in his mother's milk.
Wolaitta_Sentences: "Intte gaden baira kaxxida kattaappe koiro murutaa GODAA intte Xoossaa keettaa ehiite. "Deeshsha maraa a aayee maattan doissoppite" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And the LORD said unto Moses, Write thou these words: for after the tenor of these words I have made a covenant with thee and with Israel.
Wolaitta_Sentences: GODAI Muusa, "Taani nenaaranne Israa7eela asaara maachchaa maacettiyoi ha qaalati giyo maaraana gidiyo gishshau, ha qaalata xaafa" yaagiis.

English_Sentences: And he was there with the LORD forty days and forty nights; he did neither eat bread, nor drink water. And he wrote upon the tables the words of the covenant, the ten commandments.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee katta meennaaninne haatta uyennan, oitamu gallassaanne oitamu qammaa GODAARA yan gam77iis; gam77idi maachchaa qaalata, tammu azazota masettida shuchchan xaafiis.

English_Sentences: And it came to pass, when Moses came down from mount Sinai with the two tables of testimony in Moses' hand, when he came down from the mount, that Moses wist not that the skin of his face shone while he talked with him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Muusee GODAARA haasayiiddi gam77ido gishshau, he naa77u masettida shuchchata i ba kushiyan oiqqidi Siinaa Deriyaappe duge wodhdhido wode, a som77oi phooliis; shin i hegaa eribeenna.

English_Sentences: And when Aaron and all the children of Israel saw Moses, behold, the skin of his face shone; and they were afraid to come nigh him.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Aarooninne Israa7eela asai ubbai Muusa xeellidi, a som77oi phooliyoogaa be7idosona; be7idi eti akko shiiqanau yayyidosona.

English_Sentences: And Moses called unto them; and Aaron and all the rulers of the congregation returned unto him: and Moses talked with them.
Wolaitta_Sentences: SHin Muusee eta xeesiis; xeesin Aarooninne yaa7aa kaalettiya halaqati ubbai akko simmidosona; simmin i eta haasayissiis.

English_Sentences: And afterward all the children of Israel came nigh: and he gave them in commandment all that the LORD had spoken with him in mount Sinai.
Wolaitta_Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan Israa7eela asai ubbai akko shiiqiis; shiiqin GODAI ayyo Siinaa Deriyan immido azazo ubbaa i etau immiis.
